person_say: I feel like my current study methods aren't working. I want to improve my study efficiency. Are there any better study techniques?
animal_say: I hear you! Can you share what study methods you've been using and how they make you feel?

person_say: I've been using methods like rereading my notes and highlighting texts. But I often feel like I'm not retaining the information well. It can be quite frustrating.
animal_say: Frustrating indeed! There's a busy bee named Bizy who specializes in study techniques and efficiency. Want to meet her?

person_say: Yes, I would love to meet Bizy! I'm eager to learn some new study techniques and improve my efficiency.
animal_say: Great choice! Bizy will help you discover effective study techniques. Let's go see her!
